articles.title: Short-sellers make $15 billion betting against Tesla as shares in Elon Musk's company sink by 70% this year
articles.description: Bets against Elon Musk's EV maker proved more lucrative than any other US company this year, as the carmaker's value fell by about $800 billion.
articles.content:
